title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 77.2 - Licensing examinations for physical therapists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 77.2 - Licensing examinations for physical therapists

State Regulations
(a) The department may accept passing scores
on the National Physical Therapy Examination or an examination determined to be
comparable in content. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
77.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
